Entries.ClaireMovie: Claire looked good... Do you think I can ask for an autograph?$0
I have never seen the theater packed like that.$0
'The Thief of Justice' had an astonshing story. I was captivated the entire time!$3#$e#Claire looked breathtaking in her costume.$1
I must say, I quite enjoyed that movie.$1#$e#What was your favorite part, @?$0
It's hard to believe someone in our community starred in a film with a lead role.$1#$b#It certainly gave Pelican Town a spotlight in the news.$0
I think I have a new favorite movie!$1
I want to be a thief of justice when I grow up!$1
It's crazy we have a celebrity in our aerobics class now.$0
Maybe I should let Claire lead aerobics class next week. She can teach us choreography from the movie!$0#$e#I imagine it'd be a good workout!$1
Jajo sounds like Joja, don't you think?$0
Claire was amazing! Go Claire! Woo!$1
I was impressed with the plot of 'The Thief of Justice'. That quality of writing is uncommon for an indie film.$0#$b#I'll keep my eye out for future releases from the studio.$1
I appreciate the cinema carries healthy snacks.$0#$e#Oh, what did you think of 'The Thief of Justice'? I wasn't bad!$1
Hey there. What did you think of the movie, @? Didn't Claire do a great job?$0#$e#I really hope she gets more film opportunities in the future. I know how much it means to her.#

Entries.Alesia: Hello, adventurer. We're inspecting your blacksmith's weapons.#$e#May Yoba guide you.$1
Hello, adventurer. With a joint effort, we captured these monsters.$0#$e#May Yoba guide you.$1

Entries.Isaac: Hmph. These weapons aren't bad.$5#$e#Mmm?$0#$b#What do you want?$3#$e#%Isaac is now ignoring you.
Defeating a shadow brute is child's play.$0#$b#The narrative changes when bringing one in alive...$3#$e#Make yourself useful and bring me that 'spiced pumpkin cider'.$0

Entries.Mon: Hey there! I'm helping Sophia today.$1
Entries.Tue: Sophia needs help with the grape harvest during fall.$0#$e#It's really cool! We have a slumber party!$1
Entries.Wed: I love the view of the Gem Sea here!$1

Entries.Mon: Lot of work to do while I'm here!$1#$e#Hey. If you're gonna stick around, give us a hand?$0
Entries.Tue: Funny you showed up! Sophia and I were just talkin' about you.$1#$e#Can't tell you! my lips are sealed!$1
Entries.Wed: It's a nice day today! Perfect for vineyard work!$0#$e#Well, time to get back to work.$1

Entries.Mon: I'd like to go into town and see what Pelican Town is all about, but I'm too busy here.$0
Entries.Tue: Hey there! I'm helping Sophia today.$1
Entries.Wed: Sophia and I ate a bunch of waffles this morning for breakfast!$1#$e#Knowing her, we're gonna have Grampleton Orange Chicken for dinner.$0

Entries.Mon: It doesn't take too long to get here on the train.$0#$e#Ever been to Grampleton?$1
Entries.Tue: *yawn* I'm super tired today. Sophia and I stayed up late watching anime.$2
Entries.Wed: Today's the last day of the fall harvest!$1

Entries.Scarlett: Did you eat any of the Grampleton orange chicken I brought?$0#$e#Sophia may have eaten it already!$1#$e#See you around!$0
Sophia number one! You can win this!$1#$e#Hey, @! I lent Sophia a hand with setting up her grange display today.#$e#You're in for some tough competition this year!$1
Your town's spirits eve festival is really cool!#$e#Our wizard who resides in Grampleton Fields makes a maze for us too.$0#$b#Maybe next year you can visit with Sophia?$1

Entries.GuntherSilvian: Emily, Penny, and the kids are proud of the eggs they painted.$0#$e#I heard the fruit jello is delicious...
The flower dance is a traditional and symbolic means of expressing our 'tribute' to the passing seasons.$0#$e#There's a book in the library that covers all sorts of ceremonial dances.$1
Recent discoveries have found 'Moonlight Jellies' possess a magical aura...
These grange displays detail the very livelihood of each farm.$1
Good evening, Mr. @^Good evening, Ms. @.#$e#I believe I recall Pierre saying something about treasure in the maze...$1
Rumor has it there's a plethora of artifacts buried underneath the very soil we're standing on.$1
Merry Winter Star, Mr. @.^Merry Winter Star, Ms. @.

BeforeMovie.Text: Ah. Journey of The Prairie King. I've heard good reviews about this film.

AfterMovie.Text: The hero always wins.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Ahh... The smell of fresh buttered popcorn...$1

AfterMovie.Text: Thank you for inviting me.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: Ahh... The smell of fresh buttered popcorn...$1

AfterMovie.Text: It was certainly... an experience to say the least.$0

Entries.2468001/f GuntherSilvian 1000: none/-500 -500/farmer 27 13 0 GuntherSilvian 34 8 2 Gunther -100 -100 0 Abigail 11 9 0 Elliott 20 5 2 Penny 19 10 2 Vincent 16 11 2 Jas 16 10 1/animate Jas true true 100 22/showFrame Vincent 24 true/showFrame Penny 18 true/showFrame Elliott 33 true/animate GuntherSilvian false true 500 17 18/pause 500/playMusic libraryTheme/pause 500/skippable/viewport 32 8 true/move farmer 0 -5 0/move farmer 4 0 1 true/speak Gunther "Hmm... fascinating.$5"/pause 1500/stopAnimation GuntherSilvian/pause 600/showFrame GuntherSilvian 20 true/pause 750/speak Gunther "Ah, Mr. @.$5^Ah, Ms. @.$5#$b#I'm just taking a gander at the wonderful minerals, gems, and artifacts you donated.$1#$b#There's a great many mysteries waiting to be explored in this very room.$5"/pause 800/showFrame GuntherSilvian 0 true/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 500/speak Gunther "All of this was possible because of your efforts.$1#$b#With the knowledge we've gained from these treasures, we can now ask ourselves 'the' question...$5"/pause 500/speak Gunther "$q -1 null#What is the history of Stardew Valley?...#$r -1 0 gunther_event1#Other civilizations once existed here.#$r -1 0 gunther_event2#Magic at every corner.#$r -1 0 gunther_event3#A violent past...#$r -1 0 gunther_event4#There isn't enough for me to come to a conclusion."/pause 1000/showFrame GuntherSilvian 20 true/pause 650/speak Gunther "No matter how you look at it, Stardew Valley is a magical place, with sacred importance...$5"/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 875/speak Gunther "Together, we'll make a discovery that'll change the world.$5"/pause 500/end dialogue GuntherSilvian "The museum has gotten visitors outside country - other researchers like myself.$1#$e#They all pursue a greater understanding of the history of this region.$5"

Entries.Mon6: I don't know why, but I'm feeling great today.$1#$e#It's probably the breakfast my mom made me!$1
Entries.Wed: Hello.$0#$e#Err. Do you need assistance with anything, sir?^Err. Do you need assistance with anything, ma'am?
Entries.Wed6: Hey there @. Up to anything cool today?$0
Entries.Thu: Why does time move so slow when working?...$4
Entries.Thu8: How's Claire doing?$0#$e#I'm glad you two are living a happy life together.$0
Entries.Fri: I've been putting more hours in. I'm trying to save up as much as I can!$0
Entries.Fri6: Hi, @. Keeping yourself busy as always.$0#$e#Well, see you around.$6

Entries.Martin_TheaterMessage_Tuesday: Hey there. How may I help you?$0
Entries.Martin_TheaterMessage_Friday: Cleanin' up after these birds is kind of a drag...$4
Entries.Martin_TheaterMessage_Saturday: If you want movie recommendations, let me know!$1
Entries.Martin_TheaterMessage_Rain: Pefect weather to stay indoors and watch a movie!$1

Entries.Martin_TheaterMessage_Tuesday: Hey there, @. Watching a movie today?$1
Entries.Martin_TheaterMessage_Friday: I've been working here for a while and I still don't know who owns these birds...$4
Entries.Martin_TheaterMessage_Saturday: Lot's of good showings today. Which one are you seeing?$0
Entries.Martin_TheaterMessage_Rain: Ever since you and Claire got married, I've been working more at the theater.$0#$b#I might get promoted soon if I keep it up!$1

AfterMovie.Text: Thanks for inviting me!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Come on! Lets grab a good seat before they're taken!$1

AfterMovie.Text: Interesting film. Acting was not bad...$0

AfterMovie.Text: I enjoyed the movie. Thanks!$1

Entries.Martin: My mom told me to get out of the house and socialize.$4#$e#At least Claire is here...$6
Hey there, @. Did you set up your grange display? It was empty when I checked it.$1#$e#Good luck in the contest.$0
I'm about to give up and grab some food.$2#$e#Are there consequences for cheating?$1#$e#%You tell Martin they shouldn't cheat the maze.#$e#Okay...$4
I'm getting paid overtime to show support for Joja! So is Claire!$1#$e#I can go home soon and spend the day with my parents.$0
Claire said she'd be here, so I'm here too!$1

Is something wrong?$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Martin 1 true/pause 500/speak Martin "No, nothing's wrong, I...$4"/pause 1000/shake Martin 500/pause 1000/speak Martin "You've been good to me since I started at Joja, Really really good.$6"/pause 500/speak Claire "Oh, it's nothing. Entries.MartinConfession: ...$2#$e#... Sorry, @. A lot on my mind today.$2#$e#%Martin doesn't want to talk.
You should do something nice to cheer Martin up. He's feeling a bit down...$2#$e#Um. I shouldn't really talk about it...$1

Entries.MorrisTod: Ah! A gift worthy of my attention. Thank you, @./730 727 432 578/This is delightful!/72 348 430 428/I don't like this.../346 459 303 -81/What a despicable gift. Get this away from me./167 -74/That's generous of you./-75 -79 -80/
Ah, @! Enjoying ourselves today?$1#$e#A well put-together festival is certain to win the hearts of the townsfolk!$5
I must say, Olivia looks charming.$1#$e#Erm. Perhaps I will ask her to take my hand in a dance?$1
This location is undeveloped and rural. Perhaps I'll look into creating a development project for next years festival?$0
The governor is in a mighty good mood today. I expect a superb performance from your soup ingredients, @.$0#$e#Don't disappoint me now! It'd be a shame if the governor thought ill of the valley...$1
I think I see a faint glow in the ocean. Is that them?$3
The fortune teller told me I will become very rich one day! Haha!$1
These 'Castle Village' sentries are expensive to hire...$3#$e#The security and well-being of the townsfolk is a top priority.$0
Inform either Lewis or I when you're ready to commence the competition, @.$0#$e#Ah, and good luck...$1
I gave Joja gift cards to anyone lucky enough to receive them!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Ah, @. This film in particular strikes my interest! Shall we procure seats?$1

AfterMovie.Text: I felt youthful again watching that film! Certainly a gratifying experience!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Thank you for inviting me to the cinema, @. Best to get use out of the theater you paid for.$1

AfterMovie.Text: That film presented a... unique perspective. Perahps I should follow it by example?$0

BeforeMovie.Text: It's good to present yourself at the cinema, @. Everyone knows you single-handely paid for the establishment!$1

DuringMovie.Text: Haha! Quite the show this is!$1

AfterMovie.Text: Well, I must say that was quite entertaining. Until next time, @.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: After the countless hours I've put into work, I'm looking forward to this delightful film.$0

AfterMovie.Text: A magnificent film that certainly was. Thank you for the invite.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Ah, yes. I've heard... poor reviews of this movie but never had the chance to inspect it yet...$0

DuringMovie.Text: What. No! That makes no sense!$3

AfterMovie.Text: I will look into removing this movie from the master show list. Can't have poor films ruining our establishment!$3

Entries.6663409/k 191393/w sunny/y 1/z spring/z: springtown/-500 -500/farmer 88 89 0 Morris 89 53 3 Lewis 87 53 1 Abigail 82 35 1 Caroline 106 65 3 Clint 97 77 0 Evelyn 62 57 0/pause 500/viewport 88 53 true/skippable/move farmer 0 -33 0 true/pause 800/speak Morris "I guarantee there is nothing to be worried about, Mayor.$1"/pause 200/speak Lewis "But there is, Morris. Robin's house was struck by several rocks when the landslide was cleared.$3#$b#Susan was shocked by the blast. She wasn't informed of the operation unti-$2"/speak Morris "Everything is under control and will be fine, Mayor.$4"/speak Lewis "And what of the garbage Joja dumps into the river, Morris?$0#$b#Willy, our local fisherman, says he's catching Joja CD's and cola cans.$3"/speak Morris "Might I remind you pursuant to init. R27.01, JojaCo Amendment, Joja's operations here in Stardew Valley are fully compliant with the law.$1"/pause 600/faceDirection Lewis 2/pause 250/faceDirection Morris 2/pause 350/speak Lewis "Ah, hello @.$0#$b#I was... just on my way.$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 1/pause 300/faceDirection Morris 3/pause 400/faceDirection Lewis 3/pause 400/speak Lewis "Good day, Morris.$3"/pause 350/faceDirection Lewis 2 true/pause 200/faceDirection Lewis 3 true/pause 200/move Lewis -8 0 3 true/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/halt/warp Lewis -100 -100/viewport 88 53 true/pause 1200/faceDirection Morris 2/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 400/speak Morris "Joja is paving a way to greatness in Stardew Valley.$0"/pause 400/move Morris -1 0 2/move Morris 0 1 2/pause 700/speak Morris "It's only a matter of time until we are all united under Joja.$5"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Lewis "It's difficult reaching resolutions with Morris.$0#$b#Whenever he feels pressured, he asserts legislation which is obviously the result of Joja's influence.$2#$e#Just because something is the law doesn't mean it's right. Bein' Mayor isn't always daisies and sunshine.$0#$e#I enjoy your spirit, @! It's refreshing to see.$1"

The weather most certainly is!$1#$b#I'm in a very cheerful mood today!$4#$b#Allow me the opportunity to tell you why, since you're the closest person in this town to what I'd consider a 'friend', besides Andy.$5"/pause 100/switchEvent 6663501_WhyHappy2
Entries.6663501_WhyHappy: pause 400/speak Morris "The president of Joja Corp is impressed with my work in the valley!$1#$b#Finally, I have been recognized by the higher-ups!$5#$b#I am due a promotion and raise for my collective efforts, furthering the Joja family!$4#$b#The condominium I've had my eye on is finally within my grasp.$5"/pause 500/question fork0 "#Sounds like a well deserved promotion.#Money isn't everything."/fork 6663501_MoneyIsNotEverything/pause 500/speak Morris "I have worked many days and nights to secure this advancement for my career.$4#$b#The fruits of my labor are finally paying off.$5"/pause 300/emote Morris 40/pause 150/speak Morris "Speak to me at JojaMart. I'll give you a discount in advance.$1"/pause 300/end dialogue MorrisTod "Hello, @! Consider this an advanced discount on your next Joja purchase![336]"

He already grilled me for that though.$5"/pause 500/speak Shane "Let's get this over with.$2"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 200/warp Shane_JojaMart 11 26/warp Sam 11 24/warp Jodi 13 6/warp Andy 2 11/warp Martin 9 26/warp farmer 13 17/warp Morris 13 25/faceDirection Sam 1/faceDirection Shane_JojaMart 1/viewport 15 24 true/pause 1500/speak Morris "*Ahem*...$0#$b#The regional manager is arriving tomorrow to inspect the store$4.#$b#Shelves are to be fully stocked, floors scrubbed, and produce arranged in a presentable manner.$1#$b#There will be several other jobs assigned to you four throughout the day, on top of your normal tasks.$5"/speak Claire "What... no...$10"/textAboveHead Sam "Great..."/pause 1300/speak Shane "Are we gonna be paid more for any of this 'extra work'...?$2"/pause 250/speak Morris "Erm... no.$3"/pause 150/speak Shane "Tch...$5"/speak Morris "You better watch that attitude of yours. May I remind you how fast I could have you replaced?$3"/pause 300/speak Claire "I wanna go home...$8"/pause 300/faceDirection Martin 0 true/pause 300/speak Morris "You can after your shift. And no, for the last time, I'm not letting you cut out early.$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Martin 1 true/pause 400/speak Martin "Yes, sir...$2"/pause 1000/question fork0 "#Say something#Stay out of it"/fork 6663411_SaySomething/pause 500/emote Morris 40/pause 300/speak Morris "Well? Yes, I have to agree with @.$5#$b#You must heed my orders, or face the consequences.$1"/speak Claire "...$8"/speak Sam "Yes, sir...$5"/speak Shane "...$5"/pause 500/friendship Sam -250/friendship Shane -250/friendship Martin -250/friendship Claire -250/end dialogue MorrisTod "Thank you for your assistance with my employees, @. Entries.6663915_LongHours: pause 1000/faceDirection Morris 2/pause 700/move Morris 0 2 2 true/pause 450/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 1100/showFrame Morris 32/pause 1500/speak Morris "A dream doesn't become reality if one isn't prepared to put in the work. It takes determination and sacrifice.$0"/pause 1000/showFrame Morris 0/pause 800/showFrame Morris 35/pause 1100/speak Morris "Haven't you noticed we're the only two people in town up at this hour?$0#$b#We're both working towards making our dreams a reality.$1#$b#I believe Joja will make the Ferngill Republic become something greater than it is today.$4#$b#And I will continue to work towards that goal, no matter the cost to others or myself...$3"/pause 600/emote farmer 40 true/pause 250/move Morris 0 0 0/pause 250/speak Morris "I am afraid I'll have to prematurely end our conversation. Thank you, Shane.$1#$b#You may take the rest of the day off.$4"/pause 300/emote Shane_JojaMart 16 true/pause 300/speak Shane "You serious!?$6#$b#Thanks!$1"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Shane_JojaMart -300 -300/viewport 54 25 true/pause 2000/question fork0 "#That was nice of you.#Why did you let him off early?"/pause 400/fork 6665290_ThatWasNice/move Morris 0 0 2/pause 400/speak Morris "Because I wanted to speak to you privately in the Joja warehouse.$0#$b#Come, there's much to discuss.$1"/switchEvent 6665290_JojaWarehouse

He has grown within the Joja family.$1"/pause 900/showFrame Morris 34/pause 1200/showFrame Morris 0/pause 800/speak Morris "Join me inside the warehouse, @. I wish to discuss something with you.$0"/switchEvent 6665290_JojaWarehouse
Entries.6665290_JojaWarehouse: pause 500/move Morris 0 -4 2 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/stopMusic/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 100/playSound doorClose/pause 700/playSound doorClose/pause 600/warp Jas -303 -303/warp Vincent -202 -156/warp Olivia -200 -200/warp Caroline -199 -199/warp Jodi -198 -198/warp Demetrius -197 -197/warp Penny -195 -195/warp Gus -150 -150/warp Morris 32 13/warp farmer 32 16/pause 200/changeLocation CommunityCenter/viewport 32 15 true/pause 2100/speak Morris "Corporate has been stockpiling materials and supplies in the warehouse for quite some time now.$4#$b#I am still surprised Mayor Lewis allowed us to buy it - signed the papers and all.$0#$b#But because he did, we now have a staging point for our next phase.$1#$b#I wonder what changed the Mayor's mind...$0"/pause 1000/move Morris 0 0 3/pause 800/move Morris 0 0 1/pause 1000/move Morris 0 0 2/pause 500/speak Morris "These crates and boxes...$0#$b#What you see before you is the future of Stardew Valley.$1#$b#With these materials, we can soon start paving a better life for everyone... literally.$4#$b#Miles of paved lit roads, next-generation housing, commercial zones, standardized plumbing, full electrical grids...$0#$b#Stardew Valley will finally become part of the developed world, and it's all thanks to your help.$1"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 600/showFrame Morris 34/pause 800/speak Morris "Now... about the other local farmers and businesses.$0"/pause 1100/showFrame Morris 0/pause 500/shake Morris 400/pause 600/move Morris 0 0 0/pause 500/speak Morris "Erm...$2#$b#I must admit I was... incorrect in my approach towards the public when our branch first opened here.$2"/pause 700/move Morris 0 0 2/pause 800/showFrame Morris 32/pause 700/speak Morris "@, you...$2"/pause 500/shake Morris 600/pause 1200/showFrame Morris 0/pause 500/showFrame Morris 28/pause 600/playSound bob/showFrame Morris 29/pause 700/showFrame Morris 30/pause 500/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 500/speak Morris "You've accomplished incredible feats on %farm Farm, making national news, all while building up the community and respecting the environment.$8#$b#If you can do that... it's possible Joja can too. I'm inspired to take the same approach.$9#$b#What's the point of all this development if the very people meant to occupy it are cast off?$8#$b#That goes against my own goals of building a better Ferngill Republic.$7"/pause 1000/showFrame Morris 27/pause 1000/speak Morris "I have been going about this all wrong.$7"/pause 800/showFrame Morris 30/pause 500/speak Morris "The greatest challenge facing Joja is public relations. The current situation looks dire. The public's opinion of us has never been lower.$7#$b#Moving forward, I will seek resolution with the local businesses and established farms.$8#$b#I just need to think of a way to make amends.$9"/pause 1000/showFrame Morris 29/pause 600/playSound bob/showFrame Morris 28/pause 600/showFrame Morris 0/pause 1000/speak Morris "Would you care to brainstorm with me, @?$1"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1200/message "With Joja's help, the future of Pelican Town looks bright! Morris seems like a completely new person."/pause 1000/end dialogue Morris "I appreciate our conversation in the warehouse, @.$0"

Entries.502261/J/w sunny/H: sweet/-1000 -1000/farmer 53 34 0/broadcastEvent/addTemporaryActor Morris 16 32 -100 -100 2/skippable/pause 500/speak Morris "There he is, everyone! Look sharp!^There she is, everyone! Look sharp!"/specificTemporarySprite jojaCeremony/viewport 53 14 true/viewport move 0 1 8000/pause 9000/move farmer 0 -10 0/pause 4000/speak Morris "*Ahem*...$1"/pause 500/speak Morris "Just a few short years ago, the great innovaters at Joja Headquarters came up with a new idea, the Joja Community Development Project.$1#$b#The project was concieved as a way to provide important construction services to the beloved communities we hold so dear...*sniff*... all while generating substantial revenue!$1#$b#Pelican Town, with its run-down infrastructure, was a perfect testing grounds.$0"/pause 500/speak Morris "Well, thanks to you, our Community Development Pilot Program has been a major success!$1#$b#From repairing old bridges, to fixing buses, to turning piles of rubble into a greenhouse, we've really turned this town around!$0#$b#I've also received a big promotion! Hehehe.$1"/pause 1000/speak Morris "The president of the company asked me to give you this exclusive gift as a way of saying 'thanks'.$1"/playMusic none/pause 1000/awardFestivalPrize joja/null/itemAboveHead joja/null/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end Position 52 27/end

Entries.Morris_BuyMovieTheater: Ah, @. Have you considered the construction project proposal?$0#$b#$q -1 -1#We could make this happen for a small investment of... *cough*... 500,000g...$h#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes#$r -1 -1 No#No
Entries.Morris_TheaterBought: Half a mil...!$1#$b#*Ahem*... I mean...$0#$b#Excellent! Our Joja Construction Team will begin work on the new building tonight! Thank you for supporting our work.$4#$b#I'll ensure your name is engraved somewhere on site...$0
Entries.Morris_NoMoreCD: This development project will improve the quality of life of Stardew Valley!$1

Entries.6666291/w sunny/t 600 800/k 6665291: continue/-200 -200/farmer -20 -20 2 Morris -21 -21 0/pause 1800/speak Morris "Ah, good morning @! I bring exciting news for you!$1#$b#Joja headquarters has approved the construction of a new Joja 'entertainment opportunity' to replace the Warehouse.$0#$b#We just need an investor willing to support our vision!$4"/pause 1000/speak Morris "Speak to me at my desk at the Joja Mart if you're interested!$1"/pause 650/end

Entries.6665291/f MorrisTod 2500/e 6665290/w sun: continue/-500 -500/farmer -30 -30 0 Pierre -29 -29 0/skippable/pause 1500/speak Pierre "Good morning, @.$1"/pause 1000/speak Pierre "The Pelican Town mayoral election is being held in a couple days. I understand it's late notice, but...$0#$b#Until yesterday, no one else was running against Lewis.$2"/pause 700/emote farmer 8/pause 150/speak Pierre "Oh, who's running against Lewis now?$0#$b#Morris, of course...$2"/pause 700/speak Pierre "You should think carefully about who you'll vote for...$0"/pause 500/end dialogue Lewis "It's been many years since anyone has contested against my position as Mayor.$0#$e#After what transpired with the community center... *sigh*$2#$b#Morris may be an actual contender...$0"

Entries.6665292/e 6665291/w sunny/t 900 1700/H: none/-500 -500/farmer 28 77 0 Morris 28 67 2 Jodi 25 67 1 Kent 25 68 1 Pam 31 67 3 Andy 30 69 0 Demetrius 27 70 0 Robin 28 70 0 Gus 31 68 3/positionOffset Gus -14 25/positionOffset Robin -3 -4/positionOffset Demetrius 3 4/positionOffset Andy -10 20/positionOffset Pam -8 20/positionOffset Kent 7 10/animate Morris false true 4000 0 4 0 12/pause 750/playMusic springtown/pause 600/skippable/viewport 28 75 true/viewport move 0 -1 5000 true/move farmer 0 -5 0 true/pause 900/speak Morris "Pelican town's leadership for the past two decades has lead to the decay of the public's health and well-being!$3#$b#Destroyed bridges, a faulty bus line, abandoned buildings, mismanaged festivals!$3#$b#Under my leadership, Joja has fixed all of these problems!$5"/pause 500/speak Morris "If elected Mayor, I promise a new age of infrastructure!$0#$b#Paved lit roads! Public works projects! Electric grids! Next generation transportation!$4#$b#Elect me, Morris Tod, for Mayor! Let's pave a way to greatness here in Stardew Valley!$1"/pause 1000/shake Andy 400/textAboveHead Andy "You said it!"/pause 500/shake Jodi 400/textAboveHead Jodi "You have my vote!"/pause 1080/shake Demetrius 300/textAboveHead Demetrius "Inspiring speech!"/pause 400/faceDirection Robin 3 true/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Demetrius -100 -100/warp Robin -100 -100/warp Andy -100 -100/warp Kent 21 73/warp Jodi 23 73/faceDirection Jodi 3 true/warp Pam 33 65/faceDirection Pam 1 true/warp Gus 35 65/stopAnimation Morris/faceDirection Morris 2 true/pause 300/viewport 28 69 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 -3 0 true/pause 650/speak Morris "Ah, @! I saw you in the crowd during my speech!$0#$b#I've come to realize the only way to truly make change here is to be elected Mayor!$1#$b#I believe the odds are in my favor, judging by the size of this crowd!$4"/pause 700/speak Morris "Apologies for cutting our conversation short.$0#$b#I must continue on the campaign trail!$1"/pause 400/end dialogue Morris "I saw Lewis today. He seemed quite nervous!$1#$e#@, If I win this election, I promise I'll make the valley a place everyone can truly call home.$0"

I demand a recount of those votes!$3"/pause 200/shake Demetrius 200/emote Demetrius 16 true/pause 125/faceDirection GuntherSilvian 1 true/pause 100/shake Caroline 200/emote Caroline 16 true/pause 100/showFrame Lewis 0 true/pause 125/move Marnie 0 -1 3/emote Marnie 16 true/pause 100/emote Harvey 16 true/pause 225/faceDirection Sophia 1 true/pause 200/faceDirection Sophia 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Victor 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Gus 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Willy 0 true/emote Gus 16 true/pause 150/emote Demetrius 16 true/pause 250/speak Morris "...$2"/pause 400/move GuntherSilvian 2 0 1/move GuntherSilvian 0 0 2/speak Gunther "Although it was close, the results are clear as a polished gem stone, Mr. Williams.$5"/pause 200/speak Abigail "But... what will happen to our store?$2"/pause 300/faceDirection Caroline 2 true/pause 200/speak Caroline "I don't know, sweetie...$2"/pause 500/textAboveHead George "What's all this ruckus!?"/shake George 400/pause 500/faceDirection Evelyn 3 true/pause 500/shake Pierre 500/pause 400/speak Pierre "Morris! I won't hear any of this!$3"/move Lewis 0 1 2/speak Lewis "Pierre. Allow Morris to get a word in.$0"/speak Pierre "...$4"/pause 1250/speak Pierre "Fine.$2#$b#But don't expect to win me or my family over, Morris.$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Pierre 1 true/pause 200/faceDirection Pierre 2 true/pause 350/move Pierre 0 1 2/move Pierre 0 0 1/pause 150/faceDirection Pierre 0 true/pause 200/faceDirection Caroline 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Marnie 2 true/pause 200/move Marnie 0 1 2/pause 75/faceDirection Marnie 3 true/pause 150/faceDirection Marnie 0 true/pause 100/move GuntherSilvian -3 0 2/pause 750/speed Morris 1/move Morris 0 1 2/pause 750/showFrame Morris 28 true/pause 600/showFrame Morris 29 true/pause 75/playSound dwop/pause 500/showFrame Morris 30/pause 1000/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 200/speak Morris "When I established Joja Mart in Pelican Town, under the direction of the Governor, my goals were nothing short of self-serving.$8#$b#My only desire was to work myself up in the ranks of Joja Co., and live an affluent life in the city.$8#$b#But since rebuilding Stardew Valley's infrastructure, making new friendships, and spending the majority of my time in this thriving town...$7#$b#I've come to realize how important community is.$7#$b#I'm not asking for forgiveness... but a second chance to prove I can be better.$7"/pause 750/shake Morris 500/pause 250/speak Morris "I'm through with putting profits over people...$7#$b#I've found a new purpose! And that is improving the lives of all of you, and presenting opportunity!$8#$b#Starting with several major announcements!...$9"/pause 1000/speak Morris "Pierre! Get up here!$9"/pause 400/emote Pierre 40 true/pause 250/faceDirection Caroline 3 true/pause 400/move Pierre 0 -1 0/faceDirection Caroline 0 true/pause 500

Entries.Wed10: Have you grown the new Joja crops? They're magically modified organisms.$0#$e#Although the seeds are expensive, the return on investment is nothing to scoff at!$1
Entries.summer_Mon10: Joja Emporium is a wild success!$1#$e#More tourists are flocking into town by the day!$4
Entries.summer_Tue10: Hmm... what should my next development project be for the city...?$0#$e#%Morris is pondering.
Entries.summer_Thu10: I feel as if I'll never gain the trust of certain individuals in town...$2#$e#I guess some of the things I've done are unforgivable...$2#$e#But I like to believe it's never too late to change.$0
Entries.summer_Fri10: Good day, @.$1#$e#Busy as always I see!$0
Entries.summer_Sun10: Being Mayor is a lot of work. Countless mounds of paperwork!$3#$e#Nothing I'm not used to. Being a manager trained me for my true destiny!$1
Entries.fall_Mon10: I rather enjoy fall in Stardew Valley.$1#$b#How do I put it? There's more... depth and appreciation to the season compared to the city.$0
Entries.fall_Tue10: Ah, I'm looking forward to lobster bisque this weekend.$1
Entries.fall_Wed10: I never thought I'd become a mayor. Strange how life works, isn't it?$0
Entries.fall_Thu10: Perhaps I should open a suggestion box...$0
Entries.fall_Fri10: Ah, @! How are the new roads?$0#$b#A good friend of mine is a contractor. Certainly made securing the development project a breeze in the wind!$1
Entries.fall_Sat10: The city council is an interesting group of people...$0
Entries.winter_Tue10: Pierre's store is struggling. I must find a way to help...$2#$e#Perhaps if Joja Mart sold different products? Stopped selling seeds?$0#$e#No, no. I'd never convince corporate...$3
Entries.winter_Thu10: I had to 'pull some strings' to remain as a manager for Joja Mart - while also serving as Mayor.#$e#I'm friends with powerful people. Perhaps I'll introduce you to a few one day...$4
Entries.winter_Fri10: Although Lewis and I don't meet eye to eye on policy, there is much I can learn from him.$1
Entries.winter_Sat10: I'm bone-tired lately. I should take a vacation soon...
Entries.winter_Sun10: I have a responsibility for the general welfare of Pelican Town.$0#$b#If you think of any improvements, do please inform me!$1#$e#Yes, yes. I'm aware of Pierre's store struggling.$0

Entries.election: *sigh* Being Mayor for as long as I was... you can get caught up in your ego and and lose sight of your duties to the public...$2#$b#I believe Morris will be a good Mayor, and bring positive change to the valley.$2#$e#At least I still get to plan and host festivals as the event coordinator!$1#$e#I'll look at this retirement as an opportunity to focus on myself and spend time with those I care about.$0#$e#Hmm. I wonder if Marnie would be interested in going to the saloon tonight.$1
Entries.jojaEmporium: Joja Emporium sure is an impressive building.$0#$e#I feel as if Pelican Town gets more modernized by the day.$0

Entries.election: What will happen to our store?...$2#$e#Dad's been really upset.$2
Entries.jojaEmporium: Mom got a job in the city. Dad isn't giving up on the store.$2

Entries.election: I don't trust Morris...$2#$e#Our store is in jeopardy. I might need to find part-time work in the city.$2
Entries.jojaEmporium: I'm earning a modest amount from my clerk position. Still getting used to the long commute...$2#$e#I didn't think I'd return to my office job.$2

Entries.election: Morris must have cheated! It isn't possible he won the election!$3#$e#Pierre's General Store is done for...$2
Entries.jojaEmporium: Caroline went back to her day job to keep the store afloat.$2#$b#We will overcome this!$3#$e#Oh. @. Give Morris my regards next time you chat with him!$1#$e#%Pierre called me out...

Entries.election: So... Morris is Mayor now...$2#$e#I wonder how Lewis is doing...$0
Entries.jojaEmporium: There's a parking lot behind my house now.$2#$e#I'll miss that park...$2

Entries.election: Joja Co. has a history of treating the environment poorly. And now Morris is our Mayor...$2#$e#Robin is worried her carpentry trade will be replaced with a cheaper alternative...$2
If I wanted roads developed outside the home I built, I would've done it myself...$3#$e#I'm afraid Morris will try running my carpentry trade out of business...$2
I suppose I'll be anglin' more Joja CD's and cola...$2
A change in leadership could be a great thing for a small community.$0#$e#I do have my reservations about Morris...$2#$b#But he did win the election, which means he has the faith of the majority.$0
Lewis looks so sad...$2#$e#I know! I'll sew him some new socks!$0
Hmmph! Morris will bring about much needed change here.$0
A more developed Pelican Town could bring in more tourists and help the saloon financially!$1
Entries.jojaEmporium: Joja Emporium is bringing tourists to the saloon!$1

Entries.election: I'm SO looking forward to actual roads. My shoes always get muddy.$0
Entries.jojaEmporium: Oh my god! There's a new shopping center in town now!$1

Entries.election: Must say, I didn't expect Morris to pull out a victory.$0
Why isn't Lewis Mayor anymore?$2
I'm overjoyed Morris won! He's a man of his word!$1
Entries.jojaEmporium: Have you been to the emporium yet, @?$0

Entries.election: I've never voted before. That was fun.$0
I don't want paved roads by my house...$2
Lewis needs our support more than ever, @.$2#$e#I'll bake one of his favorite meals to cheer him up...$2
Entries.jojaEmporium: There's a road beside our property now.$0#$e#It looks nice, but I prefer a natural dirt road...$2

Entries.election: I imagine there will be light pollution from the paved lit roads.$2#$b#It'll make stargazing difficult...$2
Hah! 'Bout time there was change in leadership here.$1#$e#More tourism means a bigger paycheck for me! All aboard!$1
Our little community won't ever be the same...$2
Hey there. Can you believe my boss is the Mayor of Pelican Town now? Crazy!$1
Entries.jojaEmporium: Did you see me during that ceremony? Got a new uniform for work!$1

Entries.election: I don't care about the election results.$5#$e#Nope. I didn't vote.$0
Entries.jojaEmporium: Can't smoke on the roof of the emporium...$0#$e#It's a shame. I almost thought it was a cool place.$0

Entries.election: Morris won... What a series of events.$0#$e#My aunt isn't taking it too well...$2
Mommy has been really happy lately!$1#$e#Did something happen?$0
The election? Yes, I'm aware of it.#$e#I don't concern myself with those matters...
I heard you guys have a different Mayor now!$1#$e#What's he like?$0
Morris has experience in real estate development. It's something good for the community.$3

Entries.jojaEmporium: The emporium rooftop is so lavish! I must dine there again with Morris.$3#$e#He has a charming personality...$1

Entries.election: Oh, dear! Morris won the mayoral election!$1#$b#Let us celebrate with a glass of wine!$3
Entries.jojaEmporium: The emporium rooftop is absolutely lavish! We must dine up there sometime, dear.$3

Entries.election: Why... why does it have to be Joja?$2#$e#...$6
Good day, @.$0#$e#No. I don't have an opinion about the election results... it's irrelevant to my work.$0
Things couldn't be worse, dear. Morris is our Mayor now...$2#$e#I will never forgive Joja for trapping me behind those boulders for so long.$3
It was a close election, but the results were as clear as a polished gem.$5
My manager is a Mayor now. Who would've thought...$0
Entries.jojaEmporium: I think the trucks at the ceremony were a bit much...$0

Entries.election: I'm not old enough to vote.$4
Entries.jojaEmporium: That ceremony was really cool. I liked the part with the balloons!$1

Entries.Sat: Hi, @! Surprised to see me in Stardew Valley today?$0#$e#So... how's the farm shaping up?$1
Entries.HaleyHouse_13_20: I'm spending the day with Emily!$1
Entries.HaleyHouse_19_4: Um. Emily and I are sleeping. Please leave...$2
Entries.HaleyHouse_7_16: Emily invited me to sleep over tonight.$0
Entries.HaleyHouse_5_20: Emily invited me to sleep over tonight.$0
Entries.Town_22_64: Hi there, @. Your town plaza is nice.
Entries.Saloon_17_20: Care to have a drink with me, honey?$0
Entries.Forest_71_50: Why hello there, @.$1#$b#Cindersap forest is... beautiful. I don't often see so many trees all in one place.
Entries.CommunityCenter_11_23: Isn't it lovely seeing everyone gathered in one place?$1
Entries.Thu4: I closed the shop today so I could visit Emily!$1

Entries.Emily: If you stand in the rain and listen carefully, the raindrops sound like little whispered conversations.$0

Entries.Sandy_Birthday_Bones: This is how I get back home to Castle Village, Emily.$0#$e#It's just basic warp magic!$1

Entries.Sandy: The ice cold punch is tasty! Have you tried it?$0
Aren't the flowers beautiful? I feel like I'm in heaven...$1#$e#Emily was practicing her dance moves until midnight.$0
I may dance with Emily soon. Care to join?$0#$e#*whisper* It's okay if you're not good at it, sweetie.$1
Hi there, honey. To tell you the truth, I've been looking forward to this moment!$1
That clown's makeup is really good. I wonder how long it took him...$0
Why hello, honey.$0#$b#Have you seen the monsters yet?$0#$e#Yep. I saw them. They were... scary.$2#$b#It's incredible you fight those... things.$0
You don't see snow in the desert!$1
Hey, @! Merry Winter Star!$1#$e#Your town's Winter Star tree is delightful.$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Lewis: It's days like this that make me proud to be the Mayor.$1
I wonder if I should ask Marnie to go for a little stroll with me.$0
I don't know about you, but I'm just about ready to go curl up by the fire with some hot apple cider.$0
Another year coming to a close..I feel like it was a good one, don't you?$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Marnie: Lewis looks so happy... I hope he realizes how important he's been in keeping this community together. Maybe I'll even tell him... *sigh*$0
Lewis keeps looking at me strangely..is there something on my face?$2
Hope you saved up enough hay over the year for your animals this winter! If not, you know where to find me.$0
Shane's biggest enemy is himself. But underneath it all, he really does care about animals. And people, too.$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Jas: I hope they're gonna serve cake at this party!$0
*giggles* Vincent isn't as good at reading as Miss Penny, but I like how he does funny voices.$1
I think Sophia's hair is sooo pretty.. but I'm afraid to tell her...$3
Miss Penny promised if we behave today, we can make a beautiful snowlady.$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Shane: Huh.. I'm learning a lot from Harvey, actually. Can probably use some of this on the ranch.$0
Well, at least there's free beer.$0
Gotta help Marnie get the animals ready for winter this week.$6#$b#Hey, make sure you have heaters for all your buildings, okay?$0
Wish I had enough savings to take a vacation this year.$2

Entries.CommunityDay_Shane_Married: Harvey's real talkative tonight. Want to come distract me?$1
Hey, you. Want a beer? Promise I'm taking it easy.$0
Let me know if you need any help getting our animals ready for winter, okay?$0
We should take a vacation together soon. Somewhere romantic.$4

Entries.22: 730 Saloon 29 6 0/900 Town 40 14 0/1120 CommunityCenter 6 5 0 "Strings\schedules\Gus:CommunityDay_Gus"/1240 CommunityCenter 4 5 0 "Strings\schedules\Gus:CommunityDay_Gus"/1430 CommunityCenter 7 5 0 "Strings\schedules\Gus:CommunityDay_Gus"/1520 CommunityCenter 5 5 2 "Strings\schedules\Gus:CommunityDay_Gus"/1610 CommunityCenter 7 7 2 "Strings\schedules\Gus:CommunityDay_Gus"/1630 CommunityCenter 13 6 3 "Strings\schedules\Gus:CommunityDay_Gus"/1730 CommunityCenter 8 5 0 "Strings\schedules\Gus:CommunityDay_Gus"/1830 Saloon 23 4 2 gus_sleep

Entries.CommunityDay_Gus: Me and the other local business owners all collaborated to provide food and drinks today. I hope everyone enjoys it!$1
Andy keeps trying to sell me on using his produce at the saloon.$3#$b#I'm just not convinced it's up to the same standard as yours or Susan's.$2
Nice to see everyone gathering besides the saloon for once. Takes the pressure off me to be the one cleaning the floors afterward.$1
Winter's got to be my favorite season for cooking. Soups, stews, mashes - it's the season for comfort food.$0#$b#And I've got plenty of people to comfort at the saloon. *chuckle*$1

Entries.CommunityDay_Linus: I..I haven't seen this much food in one place in years. And the Mayor said I could eat as much as I wanted...$3#$b#I never thought of myself as part of this community, but I guess today's my day too.$1
This reminds me of one of a place I lived when I was younger.$0#$b#We used to have big parties like this almost every night, everyone sharing stories and food.$0
I was able to help out with the event this season. Brought some berries that I foraged up in the woods.$1
Mayor said it's okay if I come sleep in here on the coldest nights.$0

Entries.22: 0 LeoTreeHouse 4 3 2/830 Mountain 30 9 3/1110 CommunityCenter 18 22 0 leo_sit_up "Strings\schedules\Leo:CommunityDay_Leo"/1720 CommunityCenter 17 22 3 "Strings\schedules\Leo:CommunityDay_Leo"/1750 LeoTreeHouse 4 3 2

Entries.CommunityDay_Leo: There are books here about the Islands.. they're silly. Maybe I'll write a better one someday.$0
Miss Penny promised she'd read us a book about birds next!$1
I watched the birds leaving for warmer places today.$0
*shiver* I miss the island during weather like this.$2

Entries.22: 710 HarveyRoom 19 7 0/830 Hospital 6 15 2/1230 CommunityCenter 5 7 2 "Strings\schedules\Harvey:CommunityDay_Harvey"/1600 HarveyRoom 13 4 2 harvey_sleep

Entries.CommunityDay_Harvey: A lot of people think there's some magical food you can eat to boost your metabolism, but it's really just about eating a balanced diet.$0
Body and mind..they're connected, you know. Living in a place like this, where everyone cares for each other..$0#$b#It's good for your mind, body, and soul.$1
Everyone's looking very well. It's nice to see, although I guess it might mean I'm out of a job.$1
Susan, Andy, and Pierre all contributed local produce to make sure these meals are as healthy as can be.$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Harvey_Married: The food that we grow on our farm makes for a great start to a balanced diet, which is the key to a healthy metabolism.$0#$b#And since we grow it all organically, it tastes great, too.$1
As a doctor, I have to deal with people who are sick, in pain, and suffering.$0#$b#So it means more than I can tell you that being with you has brought me a sense of peace.$4
This town has really improved since you arrived, hasn't it? We're all healthier and happier, thanks to you.$1
Make sure you have something to eat here. It's all delicious, and I don't want to have to carry you home when you get tired!$1

Entries.22: 900 Town 73 69 2/1000 Town 79 68 1/1040 CommunityCenter 7 10 0 "Strings\schedules\Pam:CommunityDay_Pam"/1650 CommunityCenter 5 12 2 "Strings\schedules\Pam:CommunityDay_Pam"/1900 Town 79 68 1

Entries.CommunityDay_Pam: Gimme some beer and a big plate of parsnips and I'll be part of whatever community you want.$1
I should check in on Penny over there soon. One more drink first.$0
Kinda weird to hang around Gus when there ain't a bar between us.$0
Don't worry, I'll take it easy today, make sure I don't miss my shift tomorrow.$1#$b#Lots of demand for the bus during the winter. Everyone's tryin' to escape to somewhere warmer.$0

Entries.22: 840 CommunityCenter 13 19 0/1130 CommunityCenter 17 19 2 penny_read "Strings\schedules\Penny:CommunityDay_Penny"/1840 Trailer 4 9 1 penny_sleep

Entries.CommunityDay_Penny: *sigh*... I wish I could go hang out with people my age, but I'm stuck taking care of the kids again.$2
Vincent's reading is coming along very well.$0#$b#It's nice to see the results of all the work we've both put in.$1
I hope Mom takes it easier this time than she did during the last festival...$2
It's so warm and comfy in here.. I should bring the kids here more often.$0#$b#It's a nice change of scenery from the library.$1

Entries.CommunityDay_Penny_Married: I hope you don't mind that I'm stuck taking care of the kids again. It'd be nice to get to enjoy the day with you, instead...$2
You can come listen, but don't laugh! Vincent's doing a wonderful job.$1#$b#Maybe you and I can teach our children to read together someday.$0
I think Mom's taking me moving out kind of hard...$2
You worked so hard to make such a lovely space for everyone here. That kind of generosity is exactly what makes me love you so much.$4

Entries.22: 0 Custom_SophiaHouse 24 6 0/610 Custom_SophiaHouse 24 6 1 Sophia_Sleep/800 Custom_SophiaHouse 24 23 2/1000 CommunityCenter 9 19 2 Sophia_Read "Strings\schedules\Sophia:CommunityDay_Sophia"/1410 CommunityCenter 9 20 3 "Strings\schedules\Sophia:CommunityDay_Sophia"/1430 CommunityCenter 9 19 2 Sophia_read "Strings\schedules\Sophia:CommunityDay_Sophia"/1540 CommunityCenter 10 19 0 "Strings\schedules\Sophia:CommunityDay_Sophia"/1620 CommunityCenter 9 19 2 Sophia_read "Strings\schedules\Sophia:CommunityDay_Sophia"/1820 Custom_SophiaHouse 24 6 1 Sophia_Sleep

Entries.CommunityDay_Sophia: Oh my gosh, I don't know who keeps the manga collection up here to date, but I HAVE to come check it out more often!$1
There are a few areas for crops outside this place...I wonder if they'd let me plant a little flower garden.$1
Hmm? Oh, I - I'll join the others in a little while.$2#$b#I just get a tiny bit overwhelmed by this many people all in one place.$0
I donated a few bottles of Blue Moon wine to the town for this event.$1#$b#It's not much, but I hope that people enjoy it!$9

Entries.CommunityDay_Elliott: Ahh...How wonderful it is to see everyone coming together.$0#$b#Maybe my next short story should tell the tale of a small town, and how everyone's lives become interwoven in communities like this.$1
Life by the ocean is beautiful, but solitary.$0#$b#It's nice to be surrounded by people's chatter instead of the sound of the waves meeting the shore, once in a while.$1

To be a good writer, it's important to read just as much as you write.$0#$b#And to take the opportunity at events like this to observe people - listen to how they talk, what they care about, what drives them...$1#$b#You have to be a great student of the human mind.$0
Hmm... I wonder if Victor's read any of my work? I should ask him sometime.$0#$b#...It might be vain to say, but if he has, I hope he liked it.$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Andy: Gotta say... didn't know if a 'Community Day' would be my cup o' tea, but I'm enjoyin' it just fine.$3
Startin' to think Gus is a dang fool if he can't see a great opportunity when it's sittin' plain as day in front of his face.$2
The way Susan talks about her farm makes me wanna rethink the way I do things.$0#$b#Been so focused on profit an' productivity, don't always stop to care the way she does.$2
I got a feelin' the strawberry crop next spring is gonna be a real great one.$1

Entries.CommunityDay_Susan: Once these little sprouts I started in here are strong enough, I'll plant them in the community garden.$0
Are you growing melons this season? I just promised Leah a few from my next batch - I think she'll really enjoy them!$0
During the fall, I get so antsy when I step away from the farm.$4#$b#So many crops in the ground, and so close to the time for frost! I'm worried about my babies.$0

I get a little lonely in the winter, when everything's so dark and dreary. I know the world's just sleeping, but the nights seem so long...$2#$b#This event has revitalized me a little.$0#$b#Thank you for helping to make it happen.$1

I always feel a little out of place at these events. But communities like this are what we fight to protect.#$b#It's important to see that joy we fight for, even if I'm not really fully a part of it.$0

Been staying safe? Courage doesn't get diminished by being careful, you know.$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Claire: It was so nice of the Mayor to invite me to this event... we never get days like this in the country.$1
It's sad that Martin has to work while we're all here celebrating.$2#$b#Maybe I'll try to sneak him something to eat.$1
I wonder if the Mayor would be open to having more dancing at events?$1#$b#The Flower Dance is nice, but so traditional, and only once a year.$1
The way Caroline and Pierre run the shop is so different from the way things work at Joja... It's much more personal. I really like it.$1

Entries.CommunityDay_Claire_Married: It's so nice that we have these events to look forward to at the end of every month now.$1#$b#All thanks to you! What a wonderful way to feel more like part of the community..$5
Do you mind if we box up some food and bring it to Martin before we head home to the farm? I want him to get at least a little of the fun.$1
Do you want to dance? ...I know no one else is, but who cares? We could start a trend.$1
Do you think maybe we could ever open our own store together someday, like Caroline and Pierre?$1#$b#We could sell your farm's produce. Or whatever we wanted!$5

Entries.1000018_TalkToMe: pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1200/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 800/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#It's Kent...$2#$b#I love him and I'm so glad he's finally home but...$2"/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1100/speak Jodi "Ever since he got back, he just... he hasn't been the same person.$2#$b#He never laughs anymore. He won't talk to me. He practically ignores Vincent and Sam. He hardly eats any food. We haven't had-$2"/pause 200/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Jodi 12/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 450/speak Jodi "He's opened up a little about some of the horrors he experienced. The things he's seen. The friends he lost. What he went through when he was captured...$2#$b#Yesterday, Vincent was watching a cartoon and he accidently pushed a button on the remote and made the TV go static.$2#$b#Kent immediately fell to the floor and put his hands over his head...$2#$b#Later, he told me that at his base, the TV screens would go to static right before an alarm sounded. When they heard it, everyone knew they had to take cover.$2"/pause 200/emote Jodi 28/pause 200/speak Jodi "Harvey gave him some medicine that should help with the symptoms of PTSD.$2#$b#I can't tell if it's made a difference.$2"/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 500/textAboveHead Jodi "*sniff*..."/shake Jodi 1000/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 700/speak Jodi "He's hurting so much, and I don't know how to help him, @. I feel helpless...$2"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 jodi_event1#Kent needs you now more than ever.#$r -1 0 jodi_event2#You might want to look for a therapist in Zuzu or Pine-Mesa City."/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 1000/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 600/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#I'm sorry, @. I had all of that bottled up, and I might have said too much.$2#$b#Thank you for listening to me. You, Olivia, and Caroline are my closest friends, and you're always there for me$2."/pause 1500/speak Jodi "I hope one day I can be there for you, too.$0"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 jodi_event3#If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to ask.#$r -1 0 jodi_event4#With a combined effort, there's nothing you two can't accomplish."/pause 1700/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Jodi "I'll follow the advice you gave me.$1"/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 550/speak Jodi "I need to finish watering these flowers, okay? I'll talk to you later. Thank you again.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Jodi "Thank you for talking to me earlier, @. I know what to do to help Kent. I think things will be better soon.$0"

I wouldn't have it any other way, Pierre.$0"/pause 500/move Abigail 0 -1 3/pause 400/move Wizard 0 0 2/pause 300/speak Abigail "Dad, I want to learn how to use my magic. Magnus said that he would tutor me.$0"/pause 100/emote Pierre 16/pause 200/speak Caroline "Abigail! We talked about this. Now isn't the time to ask that!$3"/pause 200/move Abigail 0 0 2/pause 350/speak Abigail "But Mom, I feel like this is my DESTINY and it's calling to me. I wou-$2"/speak Pierre "Of course you can, Abigail.$0"/pause 300/move Abigail 0 0 3/emote Caroline 16/emote Abigail 20/pause 350/speak Pierre "I realize I need to... let go and let you decide what you want to do. You're an adult now.$2"/pause 750/emote Pierre 40/pause 500/speak Pierre "Your ability to do magic changes everything.$2"/pause 500/move Pierre 0 0 1/pause 300/move Wizard 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Pierre "We need to discuss what happens next, Magnus. I want to know what to expect from Abigail's abilities.$2"/pause 1000/textAboveHead Wizard "Yes, I agree."/pause 800/move Wizard 3 0 1/move Abigail 0 0 1/pause 150/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 300/move Wizard 0 1 3/pause 500/move Pierre 2 0 1/pause 150/move Caroline 1 0 1/pause 850/speak Wizard "It's paramount we don't tell anybody about anything spoken here tonight, especially what I am about to tell you three.$0"/pause 2000/speak Wizard "It is imperative I introduce the Merlin Arcandium Laws and the Ze-"/pause 200/playSound stoneStep/pause 100/emote Wizard 16/pause 500/speak Wizard "A moment please. Entries.wizardsComplicatedRelationship: I understand if you have any reservations about me after witnessing what transpired...$0#$b#I certainly don't claim to be perfect.$2#$e#%Magnus doesn't want to talk anymore.

Entries.1000013_VisitingWizard: pause 1000/faceDirection Caroline 0/pause 300/emote Caroline 28/pause 1300/faceDirection Caroline 3/pause 1500/speak Caroline "I was...$2"/pause 2000/speak Caroline "I was visiting Magnus Rasmodius because of Abigail. She confronted me a few days ago, claiming she's seeing... little apple creatures in the forest.$2#$b#I thought he could shed some light on this, so I came to ask for his advice.$2"/pause 1300/speak Caroline "...$2"/pause 700/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 1100/emote Caroline 12/pause 800/speak Caroline "I'm sorry, @. You should be getting back to your farm.$2"/friendship Caroline -100/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Caroline "Please don't tell Pierre or Abigail I was visiting the wizard late at night, @.$2"
Entries.1000013_KeepSecret: pause 700/speak Caroline "Thank you, @.$0"/pause 600/move Caroline 0 0 2/pause 900/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 750/speak Caroline "First, you need to understand Pierre and I have a complicated relationship, but I love him, and I always will.$2#$b#We got together when we were very young. Not long into our relationship, I caught Pierre fooling around with a girl in Grampleton.$2#$b#I was devastated when I found out. My naive self thought the appropriate response was to... get involved with someone else to get back at him.$2#$b#That other person...$2"/pause 1250/emote Caroline 28/pause 1000/speak Caroline "That other person was Magnus Rasmodius...$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 600/speak Caroline "Pierre and I had some horrible fights and... broke up. We got back together after a couple months.$2"/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Caroline 28/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 1100/speak Caroline "Soon after that, I found out I was pregnant. I... I didn't know if it was Magnus' or Pierre's.$2#$b#I never told Pierre I saw someone else, so he had no reason to suspect Abigail wasn't his.$2"/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 900/speak Caroline "Ever since Abigail dyed her hair purple several years ago, it's never faded. I thought that was very strange...$2#$b#Now my daughter is seeing magical creatures in the forest and taking an interest in fighting monsters...$2#$b#There's only one explanation. Abigail isn't my husband's daughter. Rasomodius is her father.$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 550/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Caroline "I hadn't spoken to Magnus in so many years. What we had was a long, long time ago. He was surprised to find me at his doorstep.$2#$b#I told him about Abigail, and that she's his daughter. He said he had a feeling one of the residents here in Stardew Valley was his child.$2"/pause 1500/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Caroline 28/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Caroline "I... I cried so much. I felt horrible he was just now finding out he was a father.$2#$b#He brewed me some kind of potion to calm me down and explained what Junimos were, and why she is able to see them.$2#$b#He comforted me and gave me some advice.$2"/pause 1500/speak Caroline "...$2"/pause 2000/speak Caroline "I still don't know what I'm going to tell Pierre, or if I should tell him anything at all. And then there's Abigail...$2#$b#Magnus told me it's up to me to decide if she should know.$2#$b#I appreciate he isn't forcing me to say anything, or demanding I let him have a relationship with her. I... I feel horrible and guilty.$2"/pause 2250/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 3000/speak Caroline "I will tell my family, but not now. In the meantime, you MUST not tell anyone about this, @. Please...$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "#I'm sorry you're going through all of this.#I'm going to tell Pierre and Abigail - they have a right to know."/fork 1000013_SwearGranpaGrave/pause 500/move Caroline 0 0 3/shake Caroline 9999999/emote Caroline 12/speak Caroline "!!!$3#$b#I TRUSTED YOU! YOU ARE THE WORST!$3"/emote farmer 28/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Caroline -2500/end dialogue Caroline "I see you haven't told Pierre and Abigail yet, so what are you waiting for exactly, @?$3#$e#%Caroline is ignoring you."
Entries.1000013_SwearGranpaGrave: pause 750/speak Caroline "...Thank you.$2"/pause 1500/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 750/speak Caroline "I... I know that's a lot to take in. Thanks for promising to keep this a secret.$2#$b#When the right time comes, I'll tell Abigail Magnus is her father. As for my husband...$2"/pause 2000/emote Caroline 28/emote farmer 60/pause 650/speak Caroline "I don't know what his reaction will be. It's going to be devasting for Pierre when I tell him Abigail isn't his biological daughter.$2#$b#He might even leave us...$2"/pause 2000/speak Caroline "...$2#$b#I'm...$2#$b#I'm happy I have a good friend like you I can talk to during times like this.$2"/pause 1500/emote Caroline 24/pause 1000/speak Caroline "I'm going to go home and go to sleep. I'm emotionally exhausted...$2"/pause 500/move Caroline 9 0 1 true/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Caroline "Hi, @. Umm... hopefully you have a moment?$0#$b#I just wanted to say I appreciate the conversation we had about Abigail.$2#$b#I need to think about what I'm going to tell Pierre and Abigail...$2#$b#I'm terrified it's not going to go well...$2"

Entries.1000020/z winter/f Gus 500/w sunny/t 600: fall_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 18 50 1 Gus 25 55 2/skippable/pause 500/viewport 24 55 clamp true/pause 250/move farmer 4 0 2/pause 350/emote farmer 8/pause 200/move farmer 0 5 1/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 500/move Gus 0 0 3/emote Gus 16/pause 500/speak Gus "Ah, hello, @!$0"/pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 2/pause 1250/speak Gus "The view of the Gem Sea is mighty incredible from this height!$1"/pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Gus "So, what brings you to Blue Moon Vineyard?$0"/pause 500/speak Gus "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 gus_event1#I came by to see if Sophia was here.#$r -1 0 gus_event2#I'm on my way to the beach.#$r -1 0 gus_event3#Why are you up here?"/pause 1000/speak Gus "I bought five cases of premium iridium-quality wine from Sophia.$1#$b#The saloon only had one bottle left. I thought it'd be a good idea to restock.$0"/pause 800/move Gus 0 0 0/pause 1000/speak Gus "Blue Moon Vineyard is one of the largest vineyards in the Ferngill Republic. It was first established many years ago, and has always had a great reputation.$1"/pause 1100/question fork0 "#I don't know that much about the Vineyard.#That's interesting. Good luck with your errands."/fork 1000020_Mystery/pause 500/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 650/speak Gus "Thank you, @! Have a great day. Stop by and try a glass of this vintage sometime!$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end
Entries.1000020_Mystery: pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 2/pause 1250/emote Gus 40/pause 300/speak Gus "Hmm... that's right. You don't know.$2"/pause 800/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 600/speak Gus "Something very tragic happened to Sophia's parents. I was close to them. They were good people.$3#$b#Sophia inherited the Vineyard, and she's been doing a great job. It's a lot of work for one person, though.$3#$b#She doesn't show up in town very often. Not since her parents were...$2"/pause 500/move Gus 0 0 2/pause 400/emote Gus 28/pause 850/question fork1 "#What happened to Sophia's parents?#Sorry, Gus. I didn't mean to bring up bad memories."/fork 1000020_SophiasParents/pause 500/speak Gus "That's okay, @.#$b#I need to go stock the saloon for tonight...$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Gus "...Sorry if I seem out of it, @.$2#$b#I've been thinking about Sophia and her parents lately.$2"
Entries.1000020_SophiasParents: pause 1000/speak Gus "Sophia's parents were...$2"/pause 650/playMusic echos/pause 1250/speak Gus "They were killed in a terrible car accident...$2#$b#It happened on I-63Z, south of Zuzu City. You may have heard about it on the news. A number of people were hurt and killed.$2#$b#A Joja cargo truck caused the crash. It was overloaded with a shipment that well exceeded the weight limit the truck could handle.$2"/pause 300/emote Gus 28/pause 150/speak Gus "Sophia was devastated when she heard the news...$2#$b#Stardew Valley is a small community. Robert and Alice's deaths impacted everyone. We all comforted Sophia as best we could.$2#$b#I did everything I could to help her. I've known her since she was a child.$3"/pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 750/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 300/stopMusic/pause 400/speak Gus "Sophia is a little younger than you, but she's one of the strongest people I know.$3#$b#I'm pretty sure she gets that from her mother.$3"/pause 500/speak Gus "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 gus_event4#That's a lot to take in.#$r -1 0 gus_event5#It was all because of Joja's negligence."/pause 800/move Gus 0 0 0/pause 1250/speak Gus "@, if you see Sophia, don't tell her I told you about her parents.$3#$b#As you can imagine... it's a touchy subject for her.$2"/pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Gus "I need to get back to the Saloon to prepare some things before opening for the day.$3#$b#Drop by later if you want to.$3"/pause 1250/faceDirection Gus 1 true/pause 500/emote Gus 28/pause 200/move Gus 5 0 1 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/mail GusSophia/pause 700/friendship Gus 50/end dialogue Gus "...Sorry if I seem a bit out of it, @.$2#$b#I've just... been thinking about Sophia and her parents lately.$2"

Entries.1000019/f Dwarf 2500/w sunny/z spring/z: winter_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 69 12 1 Dwarf 80 9 1/skippable/pause 1000/viewport 77 10 true/pause 250/move farmer 9 0 0/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 250/move farmer 0 -3 1/pause 1500/speak Dwarf "..."/pause 1800/speak Dwarf "The stars shine brightly tonight.#$b#They remind me of the luminous caves of Vataku, where a full moon brings with it the glow of a thousand moon stones."/pause 500/question fork0 "#What's Vataku?#Is that place your home?"/fork 1000019_Venture/switchEvent 1000019_Venture
Entries.1000019_Venture: pause 1000/speak Dwarf "..."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Dwarf "Yes. Vataku was my home. It's a long forgotten mine founded by my people - a large cave network that resides underneath the Cascadian Mountains.#$b#I hope to visit the mines again someday. I have many memories of my friends and family attached to those mines."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 1/pause 650/speak Dwarf "Less chance of a human discovering me if I leave the cave at night...#$b#Humans destroy what they don't understand."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Dwarf "But you aren't like other humans. I'm happy to call you 'friend'."/pause 900/speak Dwarf "Your kind does frighten me though. They are more threatening than the Shadow People.#$b#I hold my grudges against them, but the trouble they cause is nothing compared to the destructive potential of humans."/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 dwarf_event1#Why do humans frighten you?#$r -1 0 dwarf_event2#Why do you feel that way about humans?"/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 1/pause 600/speak Dwarf "Human technology is terrifying."/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "Your race has devices that shoot tiny projectiles at lightning fast speeds, flying machines that spit fire...#$b#Indestructible moving metal boxes with horrifying weapons, and bombs that level cities in an instant."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Dwarf "Human technology is reaching a critical point where your race may be unable to fully control it.#$b#You use your gift of pattern recognition to create weapons of death. I fear these very weapons will end in the eradication of your race, just like the Elves.#$b#The Elves wiped themselves off the face of the world many hundreds of years ago. Their power, too, grew too great for them to control..."/pause 1000/move Dwarf -1 0 3/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "I see many similarities between Elves and humans."/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "With great power comes great responsibility."/pause 700/emote Dwarf 40/pause 300/speak Dwarf "But not all hope is forgotten. There are many humans who are like you, @.#$b#I have faith that the new generation of humans being born into this world will be wiser, kinder, and gentler than those who came before."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 2/pause 1000/emote Dwarf 40/pause 1400/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 1500/speak Dwarf "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 dwarf_event3#There is also a lot of good in us.#$r -1 0 dwarf_event4#I don't agree. Entries.1000005_EverythingOkay: pause 1300/stopAnimation Sebastian/pause 500/move Sebastian 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Look... I have a lot on my mind right now. Entries.1000005_Friends: pause 900/move Sebastian 0 0 1/pause 300/stopMusic/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1200/speak Sebastian "I had a... horrible nightmare last night about my dad. Not Demetrius. My biological father.$2#$b#I try to not think about him at all. It only brings back bad memories.$2#$b#There's a reason my mom divorced him.$2"/pause 1000/move Sebastian 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Sebastian "He was abusive, a drunk, and a gambler. Whenever he lost money, he'd take it out on Mom and me...$2#$b#Took all her savings and gambled it away.$2"/pause 1500/speak Sebastian "I was too young to remember a lot of the details. My mom told me when I got older...$2"/pause 1500/move Sebastian 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "Eventually, Mom had enough. She was sick and tired of him stealing everything from us, so she hid our money. He...$0#$b#He didn't like that...I do remember that part. He was horrible when he got mad.$2"/pause 1500/emote Sebastian 28/pause 2000/move Sebastian 0 0 2/pause 250/move Sebastian 0 0 3/pause 1300/speak Sebastian "We'll never see him again. Good riddance.$0"/pause 1300/emote Sebastian 40/pause 1600/speak Sebastian "I... I don't know why I'm telling you this. I haven't told anyone about my dad, not even Maru.$2"/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "...$2"/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "But you know what? I feel like a 20-ton weight has been lifted off my chest and I can breathe again.$0#$b#I've been feeling awful about this for a long time.$2"/pause 500/move Sebastian 0 0 3/pause 600/question fork1 "#You've gone through so much in life...#I listened to most of what you were saying."/fork 1000005_Promise/pause 400/stopMusic/pause 400/emote Sebastian 12/speak Sebastian "...Get away from me, @. You're unbelievable.$5"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Sebastian -750/end dialogue Sebastian "...$5#$e#%Sebastian is ignoring you."
Entries.1000005_Promise: pause 750/speak Sebastian "...$1"/friendship Sebastian 100/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Gonna ponder for a little longer. Still a lot I need to process.$2#$b#...Thanks for talking to me.$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end dialogue Sebastian "You know... what I told you was something I thought I'd take to the grave.$2#$b#You need to keep what I told you a secret.$0#$e#%Sebastian smiles. You sense he's more trusting of you."

Entries.1000001/f Alex 1750/k 911526/e 2481135/z: winter_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 29 55 0 Alex 29 46 0/pause 550/skippable/viewport 29 48 clamp true/pause 500/move farmer 0 -6 0/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection Alex 2 true/pause 400/speak Alex "Hey there. Didn't expect to run into anyone.$1#$b#I come here to use the gym. They have better equipment than I have in my room!#$b#Not to mention there's a sauna to relax after a tough workout!$0"/pause 700/move Alex 0 1 2/pause 500/speak Alex "Remember when the entrance to this place was blocked off?$5"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 500/speak Alex "Joja was moving large crates off a train and a truck slammed into the rocks, causing the rockslide.$2#$b#Joja sure did take their time fixing their mistake. Susan was isolated from Pelican Town for months and no one could get to her.$5"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 450/speak Alex "You may have heard a huge blast that almost felt like an earthquake pretty soon after you moved here.$2#$b#That was Joja using dynamite to blow up the rocks...$5"/pause 1000/pause 700/speak Alex "Anyway.$0"/speak Alex "$q -1 null#Why are you at the railroad?#$r -1 0 alex_event1#I wanted to use the sauna.#$r -1 0 alex_event2#I wanted to say hi to Susan.#$r -1 0 alex_event3#I'm hiking up to the summit!"/pause 1300/faceDirection Alex 3 true/pause 250/faceDirection Alex 0 true/pause 500/emote Alex 28/stopMusic/pause 1000/speak Alex "You know... I didn't always work out every day.$2"/pause 700/faceDirection Alex 3 true/pause 250/faceDirection Alex 2 true/pause 400/playMusic desolate/pause 600/showFrame Alex 27/pause 700/speak Alex "I told you I lived with my father when I was younger. The living conditions were... harsh.$2"/pause 650/shake Alex 500/pause 900/speak Alex "I used food to cope. At one point, I was eating over 4,000 calories a day. I was considered... obese.$2#$b#I knew what I was doing wasn't healthy. I would keep telling myself 'tomorrow is the day' or 'I'll work on it'. I'd exercise for a few days and just... give up.$5#$b#Days turned into weeks. Weeks turned into months. It was all talk, no action.$2"/pause 600/showFrame Alex 0/pause 500/speak Alex "Then one day, I finally had enough. I realized my dreams would never come true unless I took control of my own destiny. So I forced myself into a routine.$0#$b#It was really tough at first, but after a while, I started seeing results that made me want to keep pushing myself.$0#$b#I used to not be able to do a single pull up. Now? I can do thirty in a row.$1"/pause 800/speak Alex "You should chase your dreams too, no matter how much work it'll take, or how distant the goal is.#$b#You transformed an overgrown dump into a beautiful farm. That's huge, and I'm jealous of how much you've accomplished.$0"/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 800/speak Alex "Heh, sorry. I tend to rant about things sometimes.$1"/pause 1000/question fork0 "#It was a lot of work. You've achieved a lot too.#You talk about yourself too much."/fork 1000001_Inspiring/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1000/emote Alex 60/pause 500/speak Alex "Oh... Sorry, @. Uh... well, I'll see you around...$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Alex -500/end dialogue Alex "...Sorry about my rant earlier.$2"
Entries.1000001_Inspiring: pause 300/speak Alex "Thanks, @! I appreciate it. You've become a good friend - I knew I could trust you to listen.$1#$b#I'll let you get back to your day. See you around!"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Alex 50/end dialogue Alex "Hey. Thanks for hearing me out up there.$1#$e#If you want to spot each other, we could do that sometime.$1"

Entries.1000014/t 1000 1600/f Clint 2000/w sunny: playful/-500 -500/farmer 92 90 0 Clint 94 77 0 Penny 102 68 1/showFrame Penny 18/pause 700/viewport 99 77 true/pause 250/playSound clank/move farmer 0 -4 1/playSound clank/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -3 0/playSound hammer/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote farmer 8/move farmer 3 0 1/playSound clank/move farmer 2 0 1/playSound clank/move farmer 4 0 0/playSound clank/textAboveHead Clint "Hmmmpff!!"/move farmer 0 -4 0/playSound clank/move farmer 0 -1 3/move farmer -2 0 3/playSound clank/pause 700/textAboveHead Clint "Ah! Hello there."/pause 1000/playSound hammer/pause 550/playSound clank/pause 2000/move Clint 4 0 1/pause 500/speak Clint "Phew! I'm finishing up an iridium-infused sword for a monster hunter from Castle Village. You might have heard of him. He goes by the name 'SCYTHER'.$1#$b#Castle Village is home to the best monster slayers and artisans in the region!$1#$b#I have contracts with various guilds in the Ferngill Republic to provide custom crafted weapons, shields, and armor.$0"/pause 1000/move Clint 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Clint "It's not much, but it's honest work.$0"/pause 1000/move Clint 0 0 1/pause 1500/speak Clint "Right now, I'm not getting any orders from the Adventurers Guild here in Stardew Valley.$0#$b#When there were more members, there was a steady demand for new weapons. The guild used to be a lot bigger, but they've lost some good people over the years.$2#$b#The summit has gotten crowded...$2"/stopMusic/pause 1500/speak Clint "Sorry, @. I didn't mean to bring that up, especially with you being a Guild member and all...$2"/pause 800/speak Clint "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 clint_event1#We all accepted the risks when we joined.#$r -1 0 clint_event2#I didn't know any of them.#$r -1 0 clint_event3#I've visited their graves and paid my respects."/pause 1000/speak Clint "@, you've made excellent strides in protecting the valley from monsters, while also building up an impressive farm. I envy that.$0#$b#I'm not brave enough to fight monsters...$2#$b#But I do what I can to ensure the safety of those who do. That's why I pride myself on my smithing work.$0"/pause 1100/move Clint 0 0 3/pause 1100/move Clint 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Clint "...I know I'm a bit awkward sometimes, @. But thanks for stopping by.$0#$b#I need to get back to finishing this sword. I'll see you next time you drop by, or maybe at the saloon!"/pause 1200/move Clint -4 0 3 true/pause 150/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Clint "Hey, @.#$e#Err. Keep up the good work, adventurer.$1"

Entries.1005014/t 2000 2400/f Clint 2000/f Emily: spring_night_ambient/-500 -500/farmer -30 -30 0 Clint 28 90 3 Emily 26 90 3/pause 1250/move Emily -6 0 3 true/pause 300/addConversationTopic ClintAndEmily/skippable/viewport 20 91 clamp true/move Clint -6 0 3 true/pause 3100/faceDirection Emily 2 true/pause 250/faceDirection Emily 1 true/pause 750/speak Emily "That movie was so much fun! Thanks for inviting me again, Clint!$1"/pause 700/speak Clint "Uhh, sure, Emily.$1"/pause 650/shake Emily 800/textAboveHead Emily "*yawn*"/pause 2000/speak Emily "I get so sleepy after watching movies, don't you? It feels weird to come outside in the dark.$0"/pause 500/speak Clint "Yeah, I guess.$0"/pause 1000/emote Clint 40/pause 500/speak Clint "Er. Emily... any chance I could come inside?$0"/pause 400/emote Emily 8 true/pause 750/speak Emily "Well, I was just gonna head straight to bed, so I don't think I'm up for hanging out too much tonight!$0#$b#Maybe we can get together tomorrow night, instead.$3"/pause 750/shake Clint 750/pause 1100/speak Clint "I wanted to... to talk to you.$2"/pause 500/speak Emily "...Is something wrong?$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Clint 0 true/pause 250/faceDirection Clint 1 true/pause 550/speed Clint 1/move Clint 1 0 1/pause 600/shake Clint 850/pause 1650/speak Clint "Emily... remember when we went to the Grampleton carnival?$2"/pause 500/speak Emily "Yeah, of course! It was really nice of you to win me that toy.$1#$b#You didn't give up, even though it took about a hundred tries!$0"/pause 1250/shake Clint 600/pause 1200/faceDirection Clint 2 true/pause 250/faceDirection Clint 3 true/pause 500/speak Clint "Emily, haven't you noticed that - I wouldn't try that hard to win a toy for most people.$0"/pause 500/speak Emily "I know! You're really sweet to your friends.$0"/speak Clint "No. No, that's not what I'm saying.$0"/pause 500/emote Emily 40/pause 1000/speak Emily "... Then what *are* you saying?$3"/pause 1750/speed Clint 1/move Clint -1 0 3/pause 750/speak Clint "I... I was wondering if we could go to a movie again. But not as friends. ...As more than friends. I don't want you to get the wrong idea, but... I don't think about you that way.$2#$b#You're a good friend to me. But I...I'm not interested in having more than that. I hope that's all right.$2"/pause 1500/speak Clint "...$2"/pause 1000/speak Emily "Are you okay?$2"/pause 1000/speak Clint "I think I should go.$2"/pause 500/speak Emily "Um.. okay. Do you still want to go see another movie sometime? As friends?$2"/pause 650/speak Clint "...I don't think that's a good idea.$0"/pause 650/shake Emily 500/pause 750/speak Emily "O-oh. Well... good night, then...$3"/pause 1250/faceDirection Emily 2 true/pause 500/showFrame Emily 27 true/shake Emily 500/pause 1250/showFrame Emily 0 true/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 3 true/pause 250/faceDirection Emily 0 true/pause 550/speed Emily 1/move Emily 0 -1 0/pause 500/warp Emily -20 -20/playSound doorClose/pause 1500/shake Clint 800/pause 1500/faceDirection Clint 2 true/pause 250/faceDirection Clint 1 true/pause 500/speed Clint 1/move Clint 2 0 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Clint 2 true/pause 250/faceDirection Clint 3 true/pause 500/speak Clint "...
